p.span: The Oklahoma State Department of Education has provided the resource at the link below to give you some information and tips on how to notice and talk with your child who might be experiencing stress or anxiety due to the changes in their life created by the COVID-19 pandemic.
You may reach out to me (Mrs. Hooper) or our middle school counselor (Mrs. McAfee) through our school email addresses:
